Welcome to My Site

This is a simple, clean website built with Markdown and a minimal build process.

Features

  • Simple: No complex frameworks, just HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Markdown: Write your content in Markdown
  • Fast: Lightweight and fast-loading
  • Customizable: Easy to modify and extend
